definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: In fact, the legibility of the spring was dissolved only gradually.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，易讀的春天才逐漸解散。

sentences.english: Whichever typeface you select, choose on that is highly legible.
sentences.chinese: 你選擇那種字體，，即清晰易讀。

sentences.english: Expert translation ensures that subtitling is timed properly and easy to read.
sentences.chinese: 專業的翻譯可以保障字幕的同步性和易讀性。

sentences.english: The First Edition was widely praised for its readability, and that emphasis is retained.
sentences.chinese: 初版廣泛因它的易讀性而被稱揚，並且重點被保留。

sentences.english: Proper use of white space can also add to the attractiveness and legibility of your warranty.
sentences.chinese: 適當使用空白，也可以使保修書美觀和易讀。

sentences.english: Margins also affect the legibility of printed material.
sentences.chinese: 頁邊距也影響印刷材料的易讀性。

sentences.english: Such text tends to be ignored, so make it succinct and easy to read.
sentences.chinese: 這些文字很容易被忽視，所以要做得簡潔易讀。

sentences.english: Dark backgrounds are very effective, but be sure to make text a light color for easy reading.
sentences.chinese: 暗色背景非常有效，但爲了易讀要確保內容是亮色的。

sentences.english: A little extra leading can sometimes dramatically improve the legibility of your text.
sentences.chinese: 一點行距就可以大幅度地提高你文檔的易讀性。

sentences.english: Legibility indicates how clear the text is visually.
sentences.chinese: 易讀性是指文章在視覺上是否明確。

sentences.english: It’s important to use formatting to help with readability. That means
sentences.chinese: 利用排版來增加易讀性也很重要。

sentences.english: The tradeoff, as you can see, is it loses some of its readability.
sentences.chinese: 付出的代價您也看到了，就是喪失了一些易讀性。

sentences.english: The example is not complete, in order to keep the code more readable.
sentences.chinese: 該例子並不完整，是爲了讓代碼更加易讀。

sentences.english: The goal is legible, inviting text that doesn't impede the flow of content to the eyes of a serious, critical reader.
sentences.chinese: 文字應該清晰易讀，讓仔細認真的讀者能流暢閱讀。

sentences.english: When naming internal variables, avoid using normal legible words.
sentences.chinese: 在命名內部變量時，避免使用普通易讀的詞語。

sentences.english: It's very easy to read and the material is very easy to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 這本書非常易讀而且內容容易把握。

definition: lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
wording/way of expressing something/turn of phrase/diction
